ingredients.ingredient: 1 head butter lettuce - rinsed, and torn

cookingTips: Drape bacon strips in a muffin tin to create crispy bowls; weave them together for structural integrity
Bake at 400°F until bacon is crispy (about 15-20 minutes), then cool slightly before removing from tin
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Edible bacon bowls transform a classic BLT into an elegant presentation. How will you crisp the bacon while maintaining its curved shape?
